pageContext.claim: “And we're being very tough on Turkey and a lot of others. They have to maintain their own properties now. They have to maintain peace and safety. And we'll see what happens -- the delegation. We're asking for a ceasefire. We put the strongest sanctions [on Turkey] that you can imagine, but they get a lot.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims he was “very tough on Turkey,” but prominent members disagreed. Sens. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) and Chris Van Hollen (D-Md.) introduced a bill that would trigger more aggressive sanctions on Turkey.
